```go
package main 
import "fmt" 

func half(val *float64) { 
   fmt.Printf("call half(%f)\n", *val) 
   *val = *val / 2 
} 

func main() { 
   num := 2.807770 
   fmt.Printf("num=%f\n", num) 
   half(&num) 
   fmt.Printf("half(num)=%f\n", num) 
} 

```
